name: One Dev
short_description: A Desktop application that has common tools used by developers in one place and can be accessed in tabs.

content.title: What is One-Dev?
content.body: One-Dev is a comprehensive desktop application designed to streamline the development experience for software engineers. It provides a suite of essential developer tools conveniently organized into app modules accessible via tabs

features.title: System Monitor
items: Resources
Task Manager
File Systems

features.title: Git Client
items: Local access
Remote access

features.title: File manager
items: Browse local directories

features.title: Notifications
items: Power

name: Youtube Manager
short_description: A Website to download YouTube videos in different formats with playlist and captions support.

content.title: Download YouTube Videos Easily
content.body: Youtube Manager is a user-friendly website that allows you to download videos from YouTube in various formats, including MP4, MP3, and WEBM. It also supports downloading entire playlists and captions for your videos. With Youtube Manager, you can save your favorite YouTube content for offline viewing or convert it to a format compatible with your devices.

features.title: Multiple Format Downloads
items: Download videos in MP4, MP3, and WEBM formats.

features.title: Playlist Support
items: Download entire YouTube playlists with a single click.

features.title: Caption Download
items: Save captions in various languages alongside your downloaded videos.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
items: Youtube Manager's simple and intuitive interface makes downloading videos a breeze.

name: SVault
short_description: A desktop application that enables users to encrypt their files locally or securely share them.

content.title: Secure Your Files with SVault
content.body: SVault is a desktop application designed to give you complete control over your data security. It allows you to encrypt your files locally, ensuring they remain unreadable to anyone without the decryption key. Additionally, SVault will empower you to securely share your files with others. With its user-friendly interface, SVault makes data protection and secure sharing a breeze.

features.title: Local File Encryption
items: Encrypt your files on your device for maximum security.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
items: SVault's intuitive design makes it easy to manage your file encryption and sharing needs.

name: Smart Bible
short_description: A Search Engine for the Bible using open source Machine Learning models

content.title: Explore the Bible with Smart Search
content.body: Smart Bible is a website that leverages open-source machine learning models to create a powerful search engine specifically for the Bible.  This innovative tool allows you to easily find and explore specific passages, verses, or topics within the Bible.  With Smart Bible, you can gain deeper insights and understanding from the scriptures.

features.title: Powerful Search Functionality
items: Search the Bible using keywords, phrases, or specific topics.

features.title: Open Source Machine Learning
items: Smart Bible utilizes open-source machine learning models to deliver fast and accurate search results.

features.title: Gain Deeper Understanding
items: Smart Bible helps you explore the Bible more effectively and gain a richer understanding of its content.

name: Github Friends
short_description: A Graph network visualization of a Github user's network.

content.title: Visualize Your Github Network
content.body: Github Friends is a website that creates a visual graph network depicting your connections on Github. With Github Friends, you can gain a better understanding of your developer community and explore potential collaborations.

features.title: Network Graph Visualization
items: See your connections on Github represented in a user-friendly graph network.

features.title: Explore Collaborations
items: Gain insights into your developer network and identify potential collaboration opportunities.

features.title: Understand Your Developer Community
items: Visualize your connections on Github to get a better sense of the developer community you interact with.

name: Github Commits Counter
short_description: Get a shields.io badge for the total commits of the month

content.title: Track Your Monthly Commits with a Badge
content.body: Github Commits Counter is an API that allows you to generate a shields.io badge displaying your total commit count for the current month on Github. This badge can be easily integrated into your profile or project readme, providing a visual representation of your coding activity. With Github Commits Counter, you can stay motivated and track your progress throughout the month.

features.title: Shields.io Badge Generation
items: Generate a dynamic badge showcasing your monthly Github commit count.

features.title: Motivation and Tracking
items: Use the badge to visualize your coding activity and stay motivated throughout the month.

features.title: Easy Integration
items: Integrate the generated badge seamlessly into your Github profile or project readme.

name: WhatsApp || Telegram Chat Analysis
short_description: It visualizes the most used words, hours texted, and general sentiments by the other party.

content.title: Gain Insights into Your Chats
content.body: WhatsApp || Telegram Chat Analysis is a website that helps you understand your communication patterns on WhatsApp or Telegram. It analyzes your chat history and provides visualizations of the most frequently used words, the times of day you chat the most, and even the general sentiment of your conversations. With this information, you can gain valuable insights into your communication style and the dynamics of your chats.

features.title: Visualized Word Frequency
items: See which words are used most often in your chats.

features.title: Chat Time Analysis
items: Identify the times of day when your chats are most frequent.

features.title: Sentiment Analysis
items: Get a general idea of the emotional tone of your conversations.
